channel.title: Machine Learning on Nathaniel Saul | Around About
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Nathaniel Saul | Around About

item.title: Machine Learning Explanations with Topological Data Analysis
item.description: We will demonstrate a novel application of Mapper to the domain of explanatory machine learning and show how Mapper can be used to understand not just the shape of data, but also understand a machine learning model.
